Don Don Don! One after another,"},{"lineNumber":237742,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次から次へと鬼が召喚されます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"demons were summoned!"},{"lineNumber":237743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最終的に10体の鬼が","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, ten demons"},{"lineNumber":237744,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダー選手を囲みます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"surrounded Player Alexander!"},{"lineNumber":237745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これにより早雲はんも含めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Including Soun, that made it,"},{"lineNumber":237746,"originalJapaneseLine":"　11対1の戦いや！　えげつないで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"an 11 to 1 battle! That's brutal!"},{"lineNumber":237747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早雲選手の勝利は決まったかと","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone thought Player Soun's victory was certain,"},{"lineNumber":237748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆が思ったのも束の間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"but it was only for a moment!"},{"lineNumber":237749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その鬼の一体一体を","translatedEnglishLine":"Player Alexander began to defeat each and every demon,"},{"lineNumber":237750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　倒してゆくアレキサンダー選手！」","translatedEnglishLine":"one after another!"},{"lineNumber":237751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まさしく暴力の嵐を吹き荒れさせて！","translatedEnglishLine":"Truly unleashing a storm of violence!"},{"lineNumber":237752,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一騎当千の強さで全てを屠ります！」","translatedEnglishLine":"With unmatched strength, he slays them all!"},{"lineNumber":237753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、ちょっと興奮しちゃいましたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew, I got a bit excited..."},{"lineNumber":237754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、いう感じで鬼を倒され孤立した早雲選手に","translatedEnglishLine":"And so, with the demons defeated and Player Soun isolated,"},{"lineNumber":237755,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダー選手の攻撃が迫ったところを、","translatedEnglishLine":"just as Alexander's attack closed in,"},{"lineNumber":237756,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パートナーであるすずさんが止めに入りました","translatedEnglishLine":"his partner, Suzu, stepped in to stop it."},{"lineNumber":237757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これにより早雲はんの反則負けや。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of this, Soun was disqualified by foul."},{"lineNumber":237758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、どっちにしても決着はついたやろうけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, either way, the match was decided."},{"lineNumber":237759,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勝利の女神はアレキサンダー選手に微笑みました」","translatedEnglishLine":"The goddess of victory smiled upon Player Alexander."},{"lineNumber":237760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、準決勝に相応しい、","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a battle worthy of the semifinals,"},{"lineNumber":237761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　白熱した戦いやったな〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"a fiercely heated fight!"},{"lineNumber":237762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあさあ、毎度お馴染み","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, as usual,"},{"lineNumber":237763,"originalJapaneseLine":"　トーナメント表の確認ですよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"let's check the tournament bracket!"},{"lineNumber":237764,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ！　本日の試合結果により、このようになりました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Okay! Here are the results based on today's matches!"},{"lineNumber":237765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遂に、遂に遂に遂に！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, finally, finally, finally!"},{"lineNumber":237766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決勝へ進む二人の決定です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The two finalists have been decided!"},{"lineNumber":237767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Aブロックより進出！　法王と魔王の子！","translatedEnglishLine":"Advancing from Block A! The child of the Pope and the Demon King!"},{"lineNumber":237768,"originalJapaneseLine":"　若き天才、＜エール＞・モフス選手！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The young genius, Player <Yell> Mofus!"},{"lineNumber":237769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Cブロックより進出！　最強の男！","translatedEnglishLine":"Advancing from Block C! The strongest man!"},{"lineNumber":237770,"originalJapaneseLine":"　老練たる格闘王、アレキサンダー選手！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The seasoned fighting king, Player Alexander!"},{"lineNumber":237771,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この二人が決勝の舞台で激突いたします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"These two will clash on the final stage!"},{"lineNumber":237772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や〜、遂にここまで来たか、ってな感じやね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow, we've finally made it this far, huh?"},{"lineNumber":237773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数多の強者、優勝候補達を倒してきた","translatedEnglishLine":"They've defeated countless strong contenders and favorites,"},{"lineNumber":237774,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人の決勝や、見逃されへん試合になりそうや","translatedEnglishLine":"these two in the final—it's going to be a match you can't miss."},{"lineNumber":237775,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合は明後日となります。","translatedEnglishLine":"The match will be the day after tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":237776,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんなで楽しみにしていましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's all look forward to it."},{"lineNumber":237777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんうん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, yeah."},{"lineNumber":237778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで今日はこの辺りでお別れです」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, we'll wrap it up here for today."},{"lineNumber":237779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちゃんとパジャマに着替えて寝ぇや〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Make sure to change into your pajamas and get some sleep~"},{"lineNumber":237780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この番組は、","translatedEnglishLine":"This program was brought to you by,"},{"lineNumber":237781,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもニコニコお仕事待ってますのキースギルド、","translatedEnglishLine":"the always cheerful and ready-to-work Keith Guild,"},{"lineNumber":237782,"originalJapaneseLine":"　の提供でお送りしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"sponsoring this broadcast."},{"lineNumber":237783,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは夢――","translatedEnglishLine":"It is a dream―"},{"lineNumber":237784,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたが見ているうたかたの夢。","translatedEnglishLine":"A fleeting dream that you are watching."},{"lineNumber":237785,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":237786,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":237787,"originalJapaneseLine":"十数年前――","translatedEnglishLine":"Over a decade ago―"},{"lineNumber":237788,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類と魔人の戦争が終わり","translatedEnglishLine":"The war between humans and demons ended,"},{"lineNumber":237789,"originalJapaneseLine":"数年が経った頃――","translatedEnglishLine":"and several years had passed―"},{"lineNumber":237790,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある日、世界そのものを覆すような事件が起こった。","translatedEnglishLine":"One day, an event occurred that overturned the entire world."},{"lineNumber":237791,"originalJapaneseLine":"神異変――","translatedEnglishLine":"A divine calamity―"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その当初の予想を裏切り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contrary to the initial expectations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手の猛攻撃がはじまります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Player Soun's fierce assault begins!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「式神が襲い、地を這い、空を舞う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The shikigami attack, crawling on the ground and soaring through the sky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム中に式神が四方八方飛び回り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shikigami fly around all over the coliseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々賑やかな光景やったな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was quite a lively spectacle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、それですら前準備に過ぎません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even that was just a preliminary preparation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手がそれらの対応に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Player Alexander was busy dealing with those,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追われている間、早雲選手、準備を終えます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Player Soun finishes his preparation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本命は鬼の召喚だったのです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main move was the summoning of demons!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ドン！　ドンドンドン！　と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom! Don Don Don! One after another,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次から次へと鬼が召喚されます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: demons were summoned!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最終的に10体の鬼が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, ten demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手を囲みます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: surrounded Player Alexander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにより早雲はんも含めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including Soun, that made it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 11対1の戦いや！　えげつないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an 11 to 1 battle! That's brutal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早雲選手の勝利は決まったかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone thought Player Soun's victory was certain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆が思ったのも束の間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it was only for a moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その鬼の一体一体を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Player Alexander began to defeat each and every demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒してゆくアレキサンダー選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one after another!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさしく暴力の嵐を吹き荒れさせて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly unleashing a storm of violence!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎当千の強さで全てを屠ります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With unmatched strength, he slays them all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、ちょっと興奮しちゃいましたね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, I got a bit excited...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、いう感じで鬼を倒され孤立した早雲選手に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, with the demons defeated and Player Soun isolated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手の攻撃が迫ったところを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just as Alexander's attack closed in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パートナーであるすずさんが止めに入りました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: his partner, Suzu, stepped in to stop it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにより早雲はんの反則負けや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, Soun was disqualified by foul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、どっちにしても決着はついたやろうけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, either way, the match was decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝利の女神はアレキサンダー選手に微笑みました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goddess of victory smiled upon Player Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、準決勝に相応しい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a battle worthy of the semifinals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白熱した戦いやったな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a fiercely heated fight!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあさあ、毎度お馴染み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, as usual,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トーナメント表の確認ですよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's check the tournament bracket!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ！　本日の試合結果により、このようになりました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay! Here are the results based on today's matches!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遂に、遂に遂に遂に！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, finally, finally, finally!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決勝へ進む二人の決定です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two finalists have been decided!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Aブロックより進出！　法王と魔王の子！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advancing from Block A! The child of the Pope and the Demon King!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若き天才、＜エール＞・モフス選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The young genius, Player <Yell> Mofus!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Cブロックより進出！　最強の男！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advancing from Block C! The strongest man!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 老練たる格闘王、アレキサンダー選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The seasoned fighting king, Player Alexander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この二人が決勝の舞台で激突いたします！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two will clash on the final stage!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や〜、遂にここまで来たか、ってな感じやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, we've finally made it this far, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数多の強者、優勝候補達を倒してきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've defeated countless strong contenders and favorites,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の決勝や、見逃されへん試合になりそうや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these two in the final—it's going to be a match you can't miss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合は明後日となります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The match will be the day after tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなで楽しみにしていましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's all look forward to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うんうん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで今日はこの辺りでお別れです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, we'll wrap it up here for today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃんとパジャマに着替えて寝ぇや〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to change into your pajamas and get some sleep~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This program was brought to you by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもニコニコお仕事待ってますのキースギルド、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the always cheerful and ready-to-work Keith Guild,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sponsoring this broadcast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは夢――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a dream―

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたが見ているうたかたの夢。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fleeting dream that you are watching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数年前――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Over a decade ago―

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類と魔人の戦争が終わり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between humans and demons ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数年が経った頃――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and several years had passed―

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日、世界そのものを覆すような事件が起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day, an event occurred that overturned the entire world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神異変――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A divine calamity―

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

ended,"},{"lineNumber":237789,"originalJapaneseLine":"数年が経った頃――","translatedEnglishLine":"and several years had passed―"},{"lineNumber":237790,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある日、世界そのものを覆すような事件が起こった。","translatedEnglishLine":"One day, an event occurred that overturned the entire world."},{"lineNumber":237791,"originalJapaneseLine":"神異変――","translatedEnglishLine":"A divine calamity―"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その当初の予想を裏切り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Contrary to the initial expectations,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手の猛攻撃がはじまります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Player Soun's fierce assault begins!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「式神が襲い、地を這い、空を舞う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The shikigami attack, crawling on the ground and soaring through the sky,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コロシアム中に式神が四方八方飛び回り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shikigami fly around all over the coliseum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々賑やかな光景やったな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was quite a lively spectacle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、それですら前準備に過ぎません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even that was just a preliminary preparation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手がそれらの対応に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Player Alexander was busy dealing with those,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追われている間、早雲選手、準備を終えます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Player Soun finishes his preparation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本命は鬼の召喚だったのです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main move was the summoning of demons!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ドン！　ドンドンドン！　と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boom! Don Don Don! One after another,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次から次へと鬼が召喚されます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: demons were summoned!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最終的に10体の鬼が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, ten demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手を囲みます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: surrounded Player Alexander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにより早雲はんも含めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including Soun, that made it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 11対1の戦いや！　えげつないで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an 11 to 1 battle! That's brutal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早雲選手の勝利は決まったかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone thought Player Soun's victory was certain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆が思ったのも束の間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it was only for a moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その鬼の一体一体を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Player Alexander began to defeat each and every demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒してゆくアレキサンダー選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one after another!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさしく暴力の嵐を吹き荒れさせて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Truly unleashing a storm of violence!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎当千の強さで全てを屠ります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With unmatched strength, he slays them all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう、ちょっと興奮しちゃいましたね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew, I got a bit excited...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、いう感じで鬼を倒され孤立した早雲選手に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, with the demons defeated and Player Soun isolated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダー選手の攻撃が迫ったところを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: just as Alexander's attack closed in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パートナーであるすずさんが止めに入りました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: his partner, Suzu, stepped in to stop it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにより早雲はんの反則負けや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, Soun was disqualified by foul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、どっちにしても決着はついたやろうけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, either way, the match was decided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝利の女神はアレキサンダー選手に微笑みました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goddess of victory smiled upon Player Alexander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や、準決勝に相応しい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a battle worthy of the semifinals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 白熱した戦いやったな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a fiercely heated fight!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあさあ、毎度お馴染み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, as usual,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トーナメント表の確認ですよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's check the tournament bracket!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ！　本日の試合結果により、このようになりました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Okay! Here are the results based on today's matches!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遂に、遂に遂に遂に！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, finally, finally, finally!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決勝へ進む二人の決定です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two finalists have been decided!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Aブロックより進出！　法王と魔王の子！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advancing from Block A! The child of the Pope and the Demon King!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若き天才、＜エール＞・モフス選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The young genius, Player <Yell> Mofus!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Cブロックより進出！　最強の男！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advancing from Block C! The strongest man!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 老練たる格闘王、アレキサンダー選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The seasoned fighting king, Player Alexander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この二人が決勝の舞台で激突いたします！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two will clash on the final stage!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「や〜、遂にここまで来たか、ってな感じやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, we've finally made it this far, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数多の強者、優勝候補達を倒してきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've defeated countless strong contenders and favorites,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の決勝や、見逃されへん試合になりそうや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: these two in the final—it's going to be a match you can't miss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合は明後日となります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The match will be the day after tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなで楽しみにしていましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's all look forward to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うんうん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで今日はこの辺りでお別れです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, we'll wrap it up here for today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃんとパジャマに着替えて寝ぇや〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure to change into your pajamas and get some sleep~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This program was brought to you by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもニコニコお仕事待ってますのキースギルド、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the always cheerful and ready-to-work Keith Guild,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の提供でお送りしました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sponsoring this broadcast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは夢――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a dream―

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたが見ているうたかたの夢。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fleeting dream that you are watching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数年前――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Over a decade ago―

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類と魔人の戦争が終わり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war between humans and demons ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数年が経った頃――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and several years had passed―

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日、世界そのものを覆すような事件が起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day, an event occurred that overturned the entire world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 神異変――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A divine calamity―
